name: GMBaldi
description:
A port of Baldi's Basics classic to the Game Maker Studio 1.4 engine. There are a few things changed. (e.g, some sound clips don't play, playtime doesn't have a jump rope overlay, sound is different at end of game, no secret ending or math game, etc.)

Baldi's Basics is a product of mystman12 (A.K.A Basically Games) and this is a fan project.
